001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.io.IOException;
007
008
009/**
010 * Specifies the requisite interface for a data codec implementation. These objects are responsible for performing model
011 * serialization and deserialization, within different circumstances. For example, models are used with databases via
012 * adapters that serialize each model into a corresponding database object, or series of database calls.
013 *
014 * <p>Adapters are <i>bi-directional</i>, i.e., they must support transitioning both <i>to</i> and <i>from</i> message
015 * representations, based on circumstance. Services are the only case where this is generally not necessary, because
016 * gRPC handles serialization automatically.</p>
017 *
018 * @see ModelSerializer Surface definition for a model serializer.
019 * @see ModelDeserializer Surface definition for a model de-serializer.
020 * @param <Model> Model type which this codec is responsible for serializing and de-serializing.
021 * @param <Intermediate> Intermediate record type which this codec converts model instances into.
022 */
023@SuppressWarnings("unused")
024public interface ModelCodec<Model extends Message, Intermediate> {
025  // -- Components -- //
026  /**
027   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelSerializer} attached to this adapter. The instance is not guaranteed to be
028   * created fresh for this invocation.
029   *
030   * @see #deserializer() For the inverse of this method.
031   * @see #deserialize(Object) To call into de-serialization directly.
032   * @return Serializer instance.
033   */
034  @Nonnull ModelSerializer<Model, Intermediate> serializer();
035
036  /**
037   * Acquire an instance of the {@link ModelDeserializer} attached to this adapter. The instance is not guaranteed to be
038   * created fresh for this invocation.
039   *
040   * @see #serializer() For the inverse of this method.
041   * @see #serialize(Message) To call into serialization directly.
042   * @return Deserializer instance.
043   */
044  @Nonnull ModelDeserializer<Intermediate, Model> deserializer();
045
046  // -- Proxies -- //
047  /**
048   * Sugar shortcut to serialize a model through the current codec's installed {@link ModelSerializer}.
049   *
050   * <p>This method just proxies to that object (which can be acquired via {@link #serializer()}). If any error occurs
051   * while serializing, {@link ModelDeflateException} is thrown.</p>
052   *
053   * @param instance Input model to serialize.
054   * @return Serialized output data or object.
055   * @throws ModelDeflateException If some error occurs while serializing the model.
056   * @throws IOException If some IO error occurs.
057   */
058  default @Nonnull Intermediate serialize(Model instance) throws ModelDeflateException, IOException {
059    return serializer().deflate(instance);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Sugar shortcut to de-serialize a model through the current codec's installed {@link ModelDeserializer}.
064   *
065   * <p>This method just proxies to that object (which can be acquired via {@link #deserializer()}). If any error occurs
066   * while de-serializing, {@link ModelInflateException} is thrown.</p>
067   *
068   * @param input Input data to de-serialize into a model instance.
069   * @return Model instance, deserialized from the input data.
070   * @throws ModelInflateException If some error occurs while de-serializing the model.
071   * @throws IOException If some IO error occurs.
072   */
073  default @Nonnull Model deserialize(Intermediate input) throws ModelInflateException, IOException {
074    return deserializer().inflate(input);
075  }
076}
